Description.p: Version 6.1.22.0 and later versions of the package installer for Windows software updates (Update.exe) support the following new features and changes: Flags set in the registry key HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Updates\UpdateExeVolatile to indicate when a restart is required after installation or removal of a software update such as a security update, critical update, or hotfix. or HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\Component Based Servicing\RebootPending or HKEY_LOCAL_MACHINE\SOFTWARE\Microsoft\Windows\CurrentVersion\WindowsUpdate\Auto Update\RebootRequired keys exist

Solution.summary: Reboot the system to apply pending updates
